name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

name: Mein Kampf
description: An autobiographical manifesto by Nazi Party leader Adolf Hitler, outlining his political ideology and future plans for Germany.

name: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist Elizabeth Bennet.
